section.heading: Scope.
section.text: These regulations govern all persons licensed as optometrists by the State.

section.heading: Fees.
section.text: The following fees are established by the Board:

para.text: Late fee (payable if renewal fee is received within the 30-day grace period)—$100;
Reinstatement fee (payable after failure to renew license for less than 5 years). Licensee shall also pay renewal fees for number of renewal cycles lapsed—$50;
Reinstatement fee to active licensure (payable to change from inactive status to active status licensure)—$100;
Fee for failure to maintain correct mailing address, name, or email address with the Board—$50; and
License verification fee (per state or entity)—$25.

section.heading: Change of Fees.
section.text: Fees are subject to change by action of the Board of Examiners in Optometry. All licensees and applicants will be notified of the change.

annotations.annotation: Health Occupations Article, §§11-205, 11-207, and 11-302—11-308, Annotated Code of Maryland
